text:

PETER 

The Magnus Archives – 126 – Sculptor’s Tool 
14 
 
Well, if your archives were a bit better organised, it wouldn’t have taken me 
almost three months to find the evidence you needed. 
MARTIN 
What? 
PETER 
I’m just saying, that we’d all be a lot better off if your Archivists actually knew 
how to archive. 
MARTIN 
(Sharply) Peter. 
PETER 
Yes, well, unless I’m mistaken, I believe I’ve unearthed a few of Dekker’s old 
statements. Of course, I still need to do a bit of verification, but I’m confident 
they should provide you with all the context you need. 
MARTIN 
Good. 
PETER 
Great. 
MARTIN 
… 

The Magnus Archives – 126 – Sculptor’s Tool 
15 
 
When all this is over, I’m telling him everything, with or without your 
permission. 
PETER 
Martin, when it’s over, you won’t want to. 
MARTIN 
Hm. 
PETER 
But he will be safe. They all will. 
MARTIN 
Yeah. 
PETER 
… 
Anyway, I’m very excited to see this rota you’ve put together. 
MARTIN 
Oh, oh… okay. 
PETER 
Never had much of a gift for administration myself, too many variables. Now, 
this box on the left, that’s the Library stuff, yes? 
MARTIN 

The Magnus Archives – 126 – Sculptor’s Tool 
16 
 
Wh—? No, no, that’s the— those are the dates. I—Look, are you sure you 
don’t want me to teach you? It’s, it’s a very simple programme. 
PETER 
No, no. Can’t stand computers. Besides, that’s why I have an assistant, isn’t it? 
MARTIN 
Yeah. I guess so. 
[Tape clicks off]
